description:
'''Cozy Powell''' (born '''Colin Trevor Flooks'''; 29 December 1947 â€“ 5 April 1998) was an English drummer who made his name with major rock bands and artists such as [[The Jeff Beck Group]], [[Rainbow (rock band)|Rainbow]], [[Michael Schenker Group]], [[Gary Moore]], [[Graham Bonnet]], [[Brian May]], [[Whitesnake]], [[Emerson, Lake & Powell]], and [[Black Sabbath]].

Powell appeared on at least 66 albums, with contributions on many other recordings. He is widely regarded as one of the greatest and most influential drummers of all time; many rock drummers have cited him as a major influence.
